meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic: <vocabulary>Sincerity</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>truth</vocabulary> are so important to me that I always keep them inside <reading>my coat</reading> (まこと). That's where I keep everything that's dearest to me, and what could be more important that sincerity and truth? Where do you keep sincerity and truth? I bet your answer is "my coat" too.
